code: import React,{useState}from'react';import MovieList from'./components/MovieList';import Favorites from'./components/Favorites';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Link,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const[favorites,setFavorites]=useState([]);const searchMovies=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?s=${searchTerm}&apikey=f73519fa`);if(response.data.Search){setMovies(response.data.Search);}};const addToFavorites=movie=>{if(!favorites.some(fav=>fav.imdbID===movie.imdbID)){const updatedFavorites=[...favorites,movie];setFavorites(updatedFavorites);localStorage.setItem('favorites',JSON.stringify(updatedFavorites));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',padding:'10px',backgroundColor:'#282c34',color:'white'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Film Arama Uygulamas\u0131"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/favorites",style:{color:'white',textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{cursor:'pointer'},children:["Favoriler (",favorites.length,")"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value),placeholder:"Film Ara"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:searchMovies,children:"Ara"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieList,{movies:movies,addToFavorites:addToFavorites})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/favorites",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Favorites,{favorites:favorites})})]})]})});};export default App;
